meanings.sent1: The podsolic soil lacked essential nutrients for plant growth.
meanings.sent2: Farmers struggle to grow crops in podsolic areas due to poor soil quality.

meanings.sent4: Her garden, once lush, now resembled a podsolic wasteland after neglect.
meanings.sent5: The podsolic earth seemed to reject any attempt at cultivation, remaining barren and unyielding.
